courses.title: Beginner Piano
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the piano with this comprehensive beginner course.

courses.title: Intermediate Piano
courses.description: Take your piano skills to the next level with this intermediate course.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques and enhance your playing abilities.

courses.title: Piano Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Build a solid understanding of piano theory to excel in your playing.

courses.title: Jazz Piano Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz piano improvisation and develop your own unique style.

courses.title: Classical Piano Masterpieces
courses.description: Study classical piano masterpieces and learn to perform them with grace and precision.

courses.title: Pop Piano Hits
courses.description: Learn to play popular piano hits from various genres and eras.

courses.title: Blues Piano Foundations
courses.description: Discover the fundamentals of blues piano and start playing soulful blues tunes.

courses.title: Piano for Kids
courses.description: Introduce your child to the joy of playing piano with this fun and interactive course.

courses.title: Piano Sight-Reading Mastery
courses.description: Master the skill of sight-reading piano music and become a more versatile musician.

courses.title: Contemporary Piano Techniques
courses.description: Explore modern piano techniques used in contemporary music genres.

courses.title: Piano Performance Workshop
courses.description: Join this workshop to hone your piano performance skills in a supportive environment.
